definition: to stand/to set up/to establish/to lay down/to draw up/at once/immediately
namely/that is/i.e./prompt/at once/at present/even if/prompted (by the occasion)/to approach/to come into contact/to assume (office)/to draw near

sentences.english: Fortunately, the fire is discovered soon after it has started.
sentences.chinese: 幸好火勢剛起就立即被發現了。

sentences.english: Immediate turn right 90 degrees, fast moving target at 12 o'clock.
sentences.chinese: 立即右轉90度快速移動目標在正前方。

sentences.english: Still, Japan quickly suspended imports of American long-grain rice.
sentences.chinese: 日本立即做出反應，暫緩對美國長粒大米的進口。

sentences.english: Once he got rich,he flung aside his old freinds.
sentences.chinese: 他有錢後就立即拋棄了舊友。

sentences.english: We thank you for your order, which have be putted in work at once.
sentences.chinese: 感謝您的訂單，我們立即予以執行。

sentences.english: The cold constricts the blood vessels, immediately reducing puffiness.
sentences.chinese: 冷能收縮血管，立即減少浮腫。
這個寶盒立即改變了兒童的生活。

sentences.english: Unforgettable scenes flashed across his mind.
sentences.chinese: 一幕難忘的情景，立即在他腦海映現。

sentences.english: At once I stood up and said it was too inconvenient, I then walked quickly to follow him.
sentences.chinese: 我立即起身說那太麻煩了，就疾步跟過去。

sentences.english: Receive alarm hind, prefectural public security bureau and department of propaganda of county Party committee undertook checking instantly.
sentences.chinese: 接警後，縣公安局與縣委宣傳部立即進行了覈查。

sentences.english: On arriving at the station, he found his wife waiting to meet him.
sentences.chinese: 他一到達車站，立即發現他的妻子在等着迎接他。

sentences.english: Send us a check today, do it now, so you will not forget.
sentences.chinese: 請於今日立即寄出支票，以免忘懷爲幸。

sentences.english: The soap lathers up in an instant and gives off an expensive scent.
sentences.chinese: 這種肥皂會立即起泡並散發出高雅香味。

sentences.english: I reminded myself then and there that in the cold of the winter I would wish I had this heat.
sentences.chinese: 立即告訴站在嚴寒裏的自己，希望能擁有夏季的炎熱。

sentences.english: Those boys dressed themselves in Li Ning tracksuits immediately.
sentences.chinese: 那些男生都立即穿上了李寧牌運動服。

sentences.english: Could you provide us with the requisite financial information so that we can open your new account immediately?
sentences.chinese: 煩請提供有關的財務資料，以能立即開立賬戶。

definition: at once/right away/immediately/on horseback (i.e. by military force)
in the first moments (of sth happening)/immediately (after an event)/first thing
at top speed/at a tremendous lick
